mods.abstract: Four images from the day of the dedication of Handy Park. Caption: Scenes reproduced by courtesy of the Commercial Appeal of Memphis, Tenn., from the dedication of Handy Park on Beale Avenue, March 29, 1931. Upper left - the crowd gathered in the park. Upper right in car leading parade - W.C. Handy with Lieut. G.W. Lee. Lower left - Parade passing down Beale. Lower right, school children in floats passing, reviewing stand. City, State and Federal officers were among the long list of speakers who were heard over radio and caught by moving picture cameras.
